on reading compounds: 役【ヤク】role, assignment, responsibility, duty, function, job, service, position (of responsibility), post, office, part (in a play, film, etc.), role, character, scoring combination (in mahjong, card games, etc.), meld, hand, yaku
役員【ヤクイン】officer, official, executive, staff
悪役【アクヤク】villain, baddie, the villain's part
大役【タイヤク】important task, important role, great duty, important mission, major part (e.g. in a movie)
役【エキ】war, campaign, battle, unpaid work (ritsuryo system), forced labor
荷役【ニエキ】handling cargo, loading and unloading
就役【シュウエキ】placed in commission, entering servitude
